name: Iron Ball
description:
Iron Ball is an exciting game, you should be enjoy it .also it's a funny game and for people who love adventure and addicting.

Do you want to check your reaction skill ? So, there is something special for you! It's a perfect app! Enjoy the calm and relaxing design of iron Ball! This exciting game give you chance to check your vestibular apparatus and agility. . Start the free iron ball but don't lose the metal ball. Earn high scores and get golden coins. It's a real chance to become a champion! Tilt your phone to control the metal ball. Be the champion and earn more golden coins! Don't hesitate and download this interesting game! You will get marvelous emotions in response.


Iron Ball FEATURES:

- Marvelous 2D graphics
- Try to survive for a long time
- 2 game modes: Infinite and Challenge!
- Multiple designs, including the classic wooden skin!
- A maze full of shelves to overcome!
- The ball keeps speeding up!
- Addicting race in the wood labyrinth!
- You can also buy special design for your ball using earned coins


Iron Ball is a marvelous game for kids and adults! Check your reaction skill! Enjoy this interesting app!
